meanings.sent1: After much thought, she was redeciding on which movie to watch.
meanings.sent2: I am redeciding on my choice of dessert for tonight.
meanings.sent3: He kept redeciding between wearing a hat or sunglasses to the beach.
meanings.sent4: The cat seemed to be redeciding whether to pounce on the toy or nap.
meanings.sent5: The student was redeciding his answer on the test, hoping to improve his grade.

meanings.sent1: The committee was redeciding on the best course of action for the project.
meanings.sent2: She was redeciding her travel plans after unexpected news.
meanings.sent3: The child was redeciding on which toy to play with next.
meanings.sent4: The team was redeciding their strategy for the upcoming game.
meanings.sent5: He was redeciding his career path, considering new opportunities.
